oai_dc:dc.dc:title: College Grove class picture, 1938
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This image was scanned from a reproduction; the names were provided by Bobby Sue Shelton. This photo is included in an article in the mid-June issue of the Eagleville newspaper.

Front row (L to R): Hatchel Graham (teacher), Bob Taylor, Jimmy Vantrease, Hershel Adams, Joe Tindall, Ira Adams. Back row: Lily Toomb, Christine Haley, Dora McPherson, Margaret Porter, Louise Toombs, Katherine Frost, Annie Lizzie Haynes Ralston, Lucy Haley.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Rutherford County Schools Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits, Group; Students
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Digital Initiatives, James E. Walker Library, Middle Tennessee State University
